messages.Tooltip.Slot.ResetPosition: Resets the local position of the slot to [0; 0; 0].
messages.Tooltip.Slot.ResetRotation: Resets the local rotation of the slot to [0; 0; 0].
messages.Tooltip.Slot.ResetScale: Resets the local scale of the slot to [1; 1; 1].
messages.Tooltip.Slot.ParentUnderWorldRoot: Reparents the selected slot to the world root while keeping its global transform.
messages.Tooltip.Slot.ParentUnderLocalUserSpace: Reparents the selected slot to the parent of your user slot while keeping its global transform.
messages.Tooltip.Slot.OnCreatePivotAtCenter: Creates a new parent above the selected slot positioned at the center of the selected slot's bounding box.
messages.Tooltip.Slot.JumpTo: Teleports you to the global position of the selected slot.
messages.Tooltip.Slot.BringTo: Positions the selected slot in front of you. Undoable.
messages.Tooltip.SceneInspector.OnAddChildPressed: Creates a new child under the selected slot. Undoable.
messages.Tooltip.SceneInspector.OnSetRootPressed: Sets the root view of the inspector to the selected slot.
messages.Tooltip.SceneInspector.OnInsertParentPre: Creates a new parent above the selected slot and copies the transform, and then resets the transform of the selected slot. Undoable.
messages.Tooltip.SceneInspector.OnObjectRootPress: Sets the root view of the inspector to the object root of the selected slot.
messages.Tooltip.SceneInspector.OnRootUpPressed: Sets the root view of the inspector to the parent of the selected slot.
messages.Tooltip.FileBrowser.CreateNew: Creates a new folder or exports the held item.
messages.Tooltip.FileBrowser.RunImport: Imports the selected file or folder.
messages.Tooltip.FileBrowser.RunRawImport: Imports the selected file as a raw file.
